Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the Ai feedback clearly outlines where it thought my writing could be improved and what was my strong points where as my teacher didn't focus on helping my writing or quality of my citations. My teacher moreso pointed out were I lost marks and minimally tried to tell me how to fix them.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt like I couldn't really pay attention to the feedback given to me by the AI as much because it isn't my teacher grading me understanding the intricacies of my assignment. I felt more frustrated by the lack of substantial feedback from my teacher.
